product_name: Chaco OutCross Lace Water Shoes - Men's
long_description: The amphibious Chaco OutCross Lace Water Shoes for men offer a breathable design with single-handed lace adjustment and protective toe caps for comfortable rafting trips or wet hikes. Features supportive American Podiatric Medical Association-certified polyurethane LUVSEAT(TM) footbeds for all-day support and comfort. Synthetic leather and mesh provide drainage, breathability and quick-drying capability. Webbing straps conform to the foot with a tethered lace for a secure fit. Rubber toecaps and heels protect feet from rocks both in the water and on the trails. Polyurethane midsoles for support and durability. Chaco OutCross Lace Water Shoes have thermoplastic urethane shanks that provide additional support. Nonmarking Vibram TC-1 rubber outsoles have 3mm-deep lugs; siped center lugs for sure traction on rocky terrain and in raging rapids.
short_description: The amphibious Chaco OutCross Lace Water Shoes for men offer a breathable design with single-handed lace adjustment and protective toe caps for comfortable rafting trips or wet hikes.
